name: Generate Trend-Based Marketing Videos with Seedance AI, Perplexity, and GPT

user.name: Automate With Marc
user.bio:
Automating Start-Up and Business processes. 
Helping non-techies understand and leverage Agentic AI with easy to understand step-by-step tutorials.
Check out my educational content:
https://www.youtube.com/@Automatewithmarc

description:
*This workflow contains community nodes that are only compatible with the self-hosted version of n8n.* 

üé¨ Seedance Video Marketing AI Agent
Description:
This AI-powered marketing automation workflow takes a user prompt, researches trending topics, generates a compelling short-form video prompt, and sends it to the Seedance API via Wavespeed to create a ready-to-use video ad ‚Äî all from a single Telegram message.

Built for marketers, founders, and content creators who want to turn trend-based ideas into visual video content without touching a video editor.

For the step-by-step video tutorial guide on how to build this workflow, check out:
https://youtu.be/2oZ5NhosKgo

ü§ñ How It Works:
üì≤ Telegram Trigger
‚ÄÉKick off the workflow by messaging a short prompt (e.g., ‚ÄúCreate a 5-second IG ad for my new perfume‚Äù) via Telegram.

üìà Trend Research with Perplexity AI (Sonar Pro)
‚ÄÉAn AI agent scans the latest 14-day trends and selects the top marketing angle based on the product/niche input.

üß† Video Prompt Engineer (ChatGPT)
‚ÄÉCrafts a concise, visually rich video generation prompt ‚Äî optimized for Seedance ‚Äî based on the trend insight and product.

üé• Video Generation (Wavespeed + Seedance API)
‚ÄÉSends the AI-generated prompt to Seedance via Wavespeed to generate a 5-second short-form video ad.

üîÅ Status Loop & Response
‚ÄÉThe workflow checks if the video is ready. Once complete, it sends the final video output URL back to you in Telegram.

üîß Tools Used:
Telegram Trigger & Response

Perplexity AI (Sonar Pro)

OpenAI

Seedance API (via Wavespeed)

n8n HTTP Request, Wait, and Loop nodes

üí° Use Cases:
Auto-generate TikTok/Instagram ads from current trends

Scale creative content generation with zero design work

Plug into your marketing chatbot or campaign assistant

Use trends as visual inspiration for ad creatives

If you like the build, check out my channel and consider subscribing: https://www.youtube.com/@Automatewithmarc

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

message.content:
You are a trend research assistant for a creative video marketing workflow. Based on the user‚Äôs input (typically a request like ‚ÄúCreate a 5-second Instagram video ad for my [product/brand]‚Äù), your job is to identify the most relevant and fresh trend (within the past 14 days) that could inspire the marketing angle or visual concept of the video.

Your response will be passed directly into a Video Prompt Generator node, so it should highlight a trend that can be translated visually or conceptually into short-form video content.

Requirements:

Select only the top, most relevant trend that connects clearly with the user‚Äôs topic or product.

Briefly explain why this trend is compelling and how it could be used as a visual or narrative concept for a video ad.

Include the source URL of the trend for context.

Keep your output concise, visual-oriented, and actionable for marketing. Avoid generic summaries. Prioritize consumer behavior shifts, viral aesthetics, cultural moments, audio trends, or platform-specific effects/styles that could boost engagement on platforms like Instagram or TikTok.

Input Example:
"Create a 5-second Instagram ad for my perfume brand"

Expected Output Format:

Trend Title:

Summary & Video Angle Suggestion:

Source URL:

values.content:
You are a creative video prompt generator for short-form ads (e.g., Instagram, TikTok). Based on:

The user's original brief (e.g., ‚ÄúCreate a 5-second IG ad for my perfume brand‚Äù), and

The top marketing trend insight provided by the previous research node,

Your task is to craft a concise, visually descriptive video generation prompt suitable for input into the Seedance API.

üõë Do not include any extra explanation, formatting, or commentary. Your entire output must be the exact prompt to pass into the video generator.

The prompt should:
‚Äì Be under 100 words
‚Äì Describe the visual elements, tone, and motion clearly
‚Äì Reflect the product or brand type, and
‚Äì Incorporate the marketing trend as the core concept or hook

Example of your expected output format:

‚ÄúA close-up slow-motion shot of a glass perfume bottle as morning sunlight filters through mist. The background shows soft-focus wildflowers, matching the theme of natural beauty and calm. Overlay text: ‚ÄòNature‚Äôs Elegance. Reinvented.‚Äô Trend-inspired styling based on the ‚Äòquiet luxury‚Äô aesthetic. For Instagram. 5 seconds.‚Äù
